title: Restaurateur Sandoval Takes on Global Challenges
itunes:title: Restaurateur Sandoval Takes on Global Challenges
description:
Chef Richard Sandoval, Founder of Richard Sandoval Hospitality Group, discusses the restaurant industry navigating inflation, labor costs and supply chain issues.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
